column5: These rooms are located in downtown Bandera and very affordable . There are 6 rooms in this building . If you have a group you can rent the whole building . This budget-oriented, sociable accommodation is where you rent a bed and share a living room, full kitchen, and 2 large bathrooms with showers and have a private entrance to your room. Walking distance to our 70 acre City Park and the Medina River. This room now has it own private flatscreen TV.
column8: Room #6 has queen-size bed, dresser, and sink, TV.
